author: ETA PRIME
description:
SteamOS 3.8 is here — and it’s finally running flawlessly on the all-new ASUS ROG Xbox Ally X! After months of testing and failed boots on the Z2 Extreme APU, it’s now working beautifully with the official main branch update.
In this video, I’ll show you exactly how well SteamOS 3.8 performs on the ROG Xbox Ally X — full installation, system setup, and real-world gaming benchmarks. You’ll see how it stacks up against the Steam Deck OLED at the same TDP and how performance scales all the way to 35W.
We test Cyberpunk 2077, Elden Ring, Spider-Man 2, Borderlands 4, and Doom: The Dark Ages — plus battery life results and tweaks for getting the best FPS possible with Simple Decky TDP and CSS Loader customization.
If you’ve ever wanted SteamOS on the Ally X, this is your moment. Hit that LIKE button, drop a comment on which handheld I should test next (GPD Win 5? Legion Go 2?), and SUBSCRIBE for the latest handheld gaming breakthroughs!

Get The ROG Xbox Ally X Here: https://bestbuycreators
title: Microsoft Won’t Like This! SteamOS 3.8 On The ROG Xbox Ally X!
